data.title: Steam Powered Giraffe – Official Website of Steam Powered Giraffe
data.text:
June 11, 2024

July 27th Show! Week of San Diego Comic-Con!

Saturday July 27th, see Steam Powered Giraffe in concert in Escondido California!

Perfect if you’re in town attending San Diego Comic-Con that same week!

VIP tickets are available to meet the band after the show!

Tickets and more info: https://artcenter.org/event/steam-powered-giraffe-live-in-concert-4/

September 27, 2023

G.G. Figurine & November Livestream Concert!

Pre-order your very own Steam Powered Giraffe figurine!: https://www.spgiraffestore.com/products/g-g-the-giraffe-collectable-figurine

U.K. customers can now pre-order through the band’s bandcamp here: https://steampoweredgiraffe.bandcamp.com/merch/pre-order-g-g-the-giraffe-collectible-figurine

The most cutest bestest adorablist robot giraffe is headed to your collectables case!

G.G. the Giraffe, the baby robot giraffe from the band Steam Powered Giraffe, is being turned into a plastic collectible figure! You can secure your figurine (and help the band fund its production) simply by pre-ordering from the band’s online store today!

This figurine is estimated to start shipping Spring 2024!

Steam Powered Giraffe is doing an acoustic livestream concert

Saturday, November 11, 2023 at 3pm PT!

Watch from the comfort of your home! Tickets are just $10! Watch it live or watch the archived video after it premieres! There are even VIP Tickets available where you can join the band after the show for a separate exclusive stream where they break character, answer questions from the live chat, and play some additional impromptu songs!

Tickets: https://www.spgiraffestore.com/products/acoustic-livestream-concert
